page.title: 11Work in Bilborough/Trowell.
page.content: In a recent employment survey of our area we came up with the following results:we found that 39% of the population were working full time,18% were at school or college,16% were in part time employment,13% were housewifes and 13% were unemployed.The survey showed that 80% of the people working were involved in both indoor and outdoor manual work,8% in the armed forces,7% clerical,6% in public services,3% in professional jobs and 5% in general domestic work.These people were also surveyed on how they got to work and we found that 27% walked,20% went by bus,8% cycled,34% in their own car,5% have a lift and a further 6% have other means of getting to work.
